info.name: Arcuate fibers
info.description: The arcuate fibers are short association nerve fibers that connect adjacent cortical gyri curve or arc from one gyrus to the next.  Thus, the name arcuate fibers.  Do not confuse this term with that of a major long fiber association bundle within the white matter of the cerebral hemisphere that is called either the superior longitudinal fasciculus or arcuate fasciculus.
